full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RA'I ZHABS KYIS MDZAD PA'I 'BUM BSANGS BEEd'URYA'I SNGON PO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,(CES 'BUM BSANGS BEEt'URYA SNGON PO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG 'DI NI, RJE KHRI SRID LTE BTZAN RGYAL PO'I SKABS SU, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RA'I ZHABS KYIS, DPAL BSAM YAS KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA'I TSE, LHA SRIN SDE BRGYAD LA SOGS NAG PHYOGS PA RNAMS KYI 'DUL BA'I CHED DU MDZAD, 'DI DE'I @033B RJES SU GANGS LJONGS BANG KYI SA LAM NAD RIMS DAD DAL YAMS ANG SAR SER BTZAN MU GI THAN PA LA SOGS BYUNG BA'I DUS SU, ,DE DAG THAMS CAD KYI ZHI BAR BYED PA'I THABS 'DI SHIN TU MCHOG GO ZER BA, SNGAGS 'CHANG PAD DKAR 'DZIN PAS YANG GONG MDZAD PA, DE'I SNYIGS MA'I LNGA BOD 'BOD PA'U DUS SU LHA 'DRE MI GSUM 'KHO 'DZIN 'THAB RTZOD KYIS, DES PHYOGS YUL KHAMS THAMS CAD LA, CHAR CHU DUS SU MI 'BABS PA DANG, LO PHYOGS MA LEGS PA DANG, RTZA CHU SHING GSUM 'DZOM MED PA, NAD RIMS TSAD LA SOGS PA LTAS NGAN MTSAN MAR GYUR BA LA, BTZUN PA 'JAM DBYANGS DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS, YAR KLUNGS KYI STONG LA 'DI DAG GIS ZHI BAR BYED PA'I MCHOG GO BSNYAM PA'I LHAN THABS SU MDZOD PA'I CHO GA BZHIN PHYOGS PHYOGS SU 'BUM @034A *, ,BSANGS 'DI BTANG MA THAG TU BKRA SHIS DGE BA'I LTAS MANG DU BYUNG BA LA, ,MI LA SEGS PA 'GRO BA RNAMS KYI PHONGS KYI SDUG BSNGAL SEL BA DANG, ,PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO'I BDE SKYID LDAN PAS TSE SRIG DBANG THANG BSENG RNAMS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO, ,)
